text: Lê Thu Thanh Hương is a Vietnamese footballer who plays as a forward for Phong Phú Hà Nam. She also plays for Vietnam women's national futsal team since 2015 ==International goals== {| class="wikitable" :Scores and results list Vietnam's goal tally first. |- ! No. !! Date !! Venue !!
